SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Entry point for the Student Grade System JavaFX application.
Controller
Controller class for handling user interactions in the JavaFX Student Grade System GUI.
DataSet
The DataSet class is responsible for managing and preparing a list of Student objects based on predefined or user-supplied student details and marks.
EmptyListException
Custom exception class used to signal that an operation was attempted on an empty list of students.
GradeAllocator
The GradeAllocator class is responsible for determining a student's final grade based on marks from three assessments.
GradeAnalyser
The GradeAnalyser class provides functionality to analyze a data set of student records.
GradeAnalyser.Range
Represents a range with lower and upper bounds.
GradeAnalyser.RangeValidationResponse
Represents the result of validating a mark range input.
Student
Represents a student's academic information including ID, name, assessment marks and final grade.
